attributes.action: Open a new investigation into the London tube bombings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public has a right to a full and independent public enquiry into the events of 7/7. Evidence of a cover-up/Government involvement is mounting and the Government needs to either prove itself innocent or come clean about the facts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
